channel.title: [PI]only certain ranked people can wear things[PI]
channel.description:
Ok so I wanna make some donor Items that only people who have donated can wear, but I haven't the slightest idea how to do this. if you would be so kind as to either give me a starter, or tell me what file to look in I can probably figure the rest out for myself.
thanks - blo0d.

item.title: [PI]only certain ranked people can wear things[PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

thanks again
EDIT: ok scratch the thing about it being for donators, but would it need to look something like this?

public void StaffItems() { if (c.playerRights >= 0 && c.playerRights >= 1 &&c.playerRights >= 2) { if (c.wearId == 1635) { c.sendMessage("Only owners can wear this items"); } } }

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]only certain ranked people can wear things[PI]
